english: Regulations on the Reporting of Fishing Operations of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels Invested by Nationals of the Republic of China
title: 投資經營非我國籍漁船作業資料申報辦法
history: Promulgated by the Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan on 16 October 2009 under Order No. Nung-Yu-Tzu 0981325550.
Article 3 amended and promulgated by the Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan on 27 March 2017 under Order No. Nung-Yu-Tzu 1061333787.
Article 3 amended and promulgated by the Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan on 1 March 2018 under Order No. Nung-Yu-Tzu 1071332734.

articles.content: These Regulations are hereby established pursuant to Article 5, paragraph 2 of the Act to Govern Investment in the Operation of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels.

Any national of the Republic of China that has been authorized to invest in or operate a foreign flag fishing vessel fishing in sea areas beyond national jurisdiction shall report, in electronic or written form, between 1 and 28 February every year its fishing operations of the preceding year to the competent authority.
These Regulations shall become effective upon promulgation.
